alert.note: Alert for South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 6:20AM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...SLICK TRAVEL FOR THE TUESDAY MORNING COMMUTE... .Bands of moderate to heavy snow have spread across the I-25 corridor this morning, with slick travel conditions in spots. Snow will also continue across the northern mountains today with snow and blowing snow likely. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Rocky Mountain National Park and the Medicine Bow Range. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous due to snow, slick roads, and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
